Text: Thanks for the upload, very neat little game, +1 rep from me, Cheers.

Loved this game back in the day. There is only one other upload of this game and it doesn't let you use the bonus maps or boats.  Hope I can with this one. :)

Thanks btw. Brings back alot of arcade memories.
ok not sure what im doing wrong but I cant get the files to open with winrar or 7zip. Could somebody help me out

You're welcome! :)

@ TyMod: I haven't tried it yet, but I've ripped the installs from the original CD, it should work.
I'll upload an emulated Dreamcast version soon (ripped from Midway Arcade Treasures 3) with 2-player support and with everything unlocked, including the bonus levels! :D

@ mustang1966: You can extract it via the 7-Zip context menu. Right click "Hydro Thunder.7z.001" > 7-Zip > Extract to "Hydro Thunder"
Alright man. This game brings back so many arcade memories man. Loved it back in the day.
